backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented Valentine features, associated files, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for quick reference during build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color variables, themes, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling intro, love prompt, reveal flow, and rendering all Valentine sections.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Closin: Final section showing teddy animation and Yes/No choices with corresponding messages and replay/top navigation.
frontend/src/components/valentine/FirstE: Overlay prompt asking 'Do you love me?' with a moving No button and a proceed action on Yes.
frontend/src/components/valentine/games/: Interactive multiple‑choice love quiz with scoring, animated feedback, and a final results screen.
Memory matching game using icon pairs with flip logic, move counting, match checking, and win state.
frontend/src/components/valentine/HeroSe: Hero section with animated hearts, background image, and CTA to scroll to the message.
frontend/src/components/valentine/MailLe: Animated intro component showing a floating-hearts background and envelope reveal, notifying parent when opened or closed.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Messag: Displays the main Valentine message with styled background, heart icon, and formatted paragraphs from valentineContent.
frontend/src/components/valentine/PlaySe: Provides a game section letting users switch between a memory game and a love quiz using styled toggle buttons.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Sectio: Fixed top navigation bar allowing smooth scrolling to site sections and replaying the intro animation.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Surpri: Full‑screen animated reveal screen with floating hearts that fades out before triggering the main experience.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Valent: Section wrapper applying spacing, optional background pattern, and centered layout for Valentine pages.
frontend/src/config/valentineContent.ts: Configuration object providing all static Valentine text content used across the themed components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, and identity restoration using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file since no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color themes, and custom animations for the Valentine's Day design.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, containers, and animations with plugin support.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, features, and requirements for the Valentine experience.
